snippet: Jon Beason, who became one of the Giants’ defensive leaders late last season, will not need surgery to correct the ligament tear and small fracture in his right foot sustained last week.
abstract: New York Giants middle linebacker Jon Beason will not require surgery to correct foot injury.
lead_paragraph: Jon Beason, who became one of the Giants’ defensive leaders late last season, will not need surgery to correct the ligament tear and small fracture in his right foot sustained last week.

headline.main: Giants’ Beason Avoids Surgery, but Status for Opener Is in Doubt
